channel.title: IGB on Savo's Site
channel.description: Recent content in IGB on Savo's Site

item.title: Force Feedback Tester
item.description: Expanded on my basic, single-axis, force feedback system to now monitor and control up to six axes and eased user configuration

item.title: Demo Show Seat
item.description: Revised the existing show seat used at demos to have its set points easily reconfigured with software. My first embedded electronics project!
